Posts.Content: May 12, 2016 08:39AM Bmg wrote: I just finished 4 treatments of Ac now I started taxol . Don't forget to take the nausea pill before what they give you wears off I did and was real sick during the night but only because I forgot that pill you'll get through it I just ate a lot if small meals as soon as I felt hungrey I ate also I was told to take a Claritin everyday because the shot you get the next day is suppose to give you body aches and for some reason Claritin helps my Ac took about two hours and I got through 4 treatments you can do it
